_sText:
zm_HL2_Prison

By pierogi88. I played over 400h on US zombie servers.
pierogi88@yahoo.com or pierogi88 on steam

An edit of d2_prison_02 map from HL2 for zombie mod. Includes barricade, holdout and jump spots. Don't change the content of the map without my knowledge. If you want some changes to the map ask me and I will do it.


Process of thought: I wanted some small map with limited number of reliable spots in order to force teamplay and have more zombies and more action. I also wanted the map to be some kind of underground but I couldn't decide on how to start. So I used one of HL2 maps as the base. To keep the map small i restricted myself to part of the original map. Eventually I saw some potential in the rest of map so I decide not to delete it. However, the full map will only be available randomly.

Have fun.

if you use this map on your server please contact me, so I can show you how stuff works + do changes to map if necessary. I can also help in testing your ZOMBIE MOD and ZOMBIE ESCAPE maps
